creator: adelmelle@apache.org
text:
Reported on fop-users. 
These options worked in FOP 0.20.5, but seem to be broken in FOP Trunk.

Works now: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=649146&view=rev
Syntax is slightly different as this is not implemented using (ugly) system properties anymore but through the renderer options.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
